memberdef.name: GET_ANALYSIS_CONTAINER
memberdef.initializer: void NAME(AnalysisContainer& result) \ { \ using namespace Pipes::NAME; \ getAnalysisContainer(result, #EXPERIMENT, *Dep::RunMC, \ *Dep::TotalCrossSection, *Loop::iteration); \ }

briefdescription.para: Retrieve a container for analyses with EXPERIMENT.
